description: When you boot up the game, all you see is a balloon floating! I thought this was a game engine! SCAM!!1!!

For flatpak versions, just put this in .bashrc:
alias love="flatpak run org.love2d.love2d"
Does not work on Endless. But will work WONDERFULLY on a Windows. I'm even working on a game there (it's definitly not a troll game.)

just make an alias for org.love2d.love2d

or 

vim .bashrc

then add 

alias love='org.love2d.love2d

then save

and you should be able to use love just like from the terminal by running love /path/to/game/folder
summary: Just like on every platform but with some extra setup
